channel.title: Were do i put the command i made? Help plz

item.title: Were do i put the command i made? Help plz
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

[quote=“dff280, post:1, topic:308213”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::Thief")&& playerRights >= 1){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("::Thief")){ //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3491;
isNpc = true;
npcId = 0008;
sendMessage(“You have left to spend”);
}

looks like that were do i put it?[/quote]

lol dude, dont use voule command maker if you dont know how to use it, it’s not easy making commands with it if your a begginer.

Read full topic
item.source: Were do i put the command i made? Help plz

item.title: Were do i put the command i made? Help plz
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

search in client.java for either

if (command.startswith("

or

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("

then place your command after one of the others.

the :: is unnecessary the server will already recognise it as the start of a command. so dont put it in your code.

Read full topic
item.source: Were do i put the command i made? Help plz

item.title: Were do i put the command i made? Help plz
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Theif") && playerRights >= 1){ // Voule Command Generator teleportToX = 3088; teleportToY = 3491; isNpc = true; npcId = 0008; sendMessage("You have left to spend"); }

If you’re using a 317 in client. java where other commands are or if you’re using a 500+ in your packets should be a commands.java

item.title: Were do i put the command i made? Help plz
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

With your other commands…

search

public void command

and there should be your server’s commands in there, just add them with the rest…
